title: Red Cabbage Slaw
ingredients: - ½ cup fresh orange juice (about 2 oranges)
- ½ head red cabbage, finely shredded
- 1 small red onion, halved and thinly sliced
- Kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper
directions: Whisk together the vinegar, orange juice, oil, and honey in a medium bowl. Add the cabbage, onion, and cilantro and season with salt and pepper. Toss to combine. Let sit at room temperature for at least 20 minutes or up to 1 hour before serving.
